subMenu.descriptionText: We don’t just supply movement for your designs – we also protect them. We offer innovative, discrete, and integrable electronic access control systems for your fixtures. Standalone or part of a broader access control network, we have the system for you.

Your go-to for kits, mounts, and extra parts for your sliding hardware. Whether it’s a bracket for special mounting or an Easy-Close dampener for a linear track, you’ll find the accessory you need here.
How Accuride Drawer Slides are Revolutionizing Outdoor Living
Need to see if one of our products will fit into your casework or millwork? Look no further: We have downloadable Computer-Aided Designs for all our slides, glides, and drawer runners.
Need to ID an Accuride slide? Find a replacement part? Browse are FAQ page for answers to those questions and more!
Request a catalog or brochure for your industry. We have literature for manufacturers, craftsmen, and more.
Need help finding the right Accuride product? Want to check up on an order? Whatever your question, we’ll have the solution!

Accuride warrants its Accuride–branded drawer slides against defects in material and workmanship for so long as the original purchaser owns them. *This warranty does not cover drawer slides which have been damaged due to abuse, improper installation, excessive loads, or any use contrary to the instructions accompanying the product.

Founded as a small tool and die shop in 1958, Accuride has gone on to become a global designer and manufacturer of premium movement solutions. But we haven’t forgotten our roots: We’re still based in Santa Fe Springs, California, 50 years after we first moved there.
Read up on the special features, technologies, and certifications that make Accuride unique and allow us to guarantee quality assurance for a wide range of applications.

Beautifying Interior Movement: The Accuride 3160EC and 3832
Life Saving Solution - 1st in Emergency Products

subMenu.descriptionText: Behind every great Accuride endeavor is a great team dedicated to quality and integrity
You can find Accuride at industry trade shows and expos across North America. Below you’ll find our calendar of scheduled events for the year. Please note our schedule may be subject to change.

If your design needs movement, look no further! Our Online Store gives you access to Accuride's vast and proven range of premium movement solutions. From telescopic slides for kitchen cabinets to weather-resistant tracks outside fixtures, we have the right movement for your design.!

Accuride is more than a global manufacturer: We’re a trusted partner with a renowned team of experts who can provide you with the most comprehensive assemblage of custom and off-the-shelf movement solutions for any market.
Accuride works with trusted distributors throughout the globe. Find the one closest to you!
